title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
**Experience the Future of Viewing with Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses!**

Discover a whole new dimension of entertainment with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses—a revolutionary pair of smart glasses that redefine your viewing experience. 

**Unmatched Display and Weight:**
- **360" Micro-OLED Display:** Immerse yourself in a breathtaking 360" Micro-OLED display, weighing a mere 75g, making it incredibly light and comfortable to wear for extended periods.
- **TüV Rheinland Certified Eye Comfort:** Enjoy peace of mind with our TüV Rheinland Eye Comfort certification, ensuring your eyes remain protected and relaxed during use.

**Stream Anywhere, Anytime:**
- **Android TV 12:** Enjoy an elegant Android TV 12 interface, designed for seamless media streaming and cloud gaming.
- **Google Play and Streaming Services:** Access a wide array of content through Google Play and enjoy streaming from popular services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock.
- **HDCP Support:** Stream high-definition content without any compatibility issues.
- **Cloud Gaming:** Play your favorite games with ease using cloud gaming technology.

**Perfect for Multiple Platforms:**
- **Platform Compatibility:** Compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows, ensuring you can enjoy your favorite content on any device.
- **Connectivity Options:** Connect with ease through USB-C, HDMI adapter, or a wireless adapter, making it simple to pair with your devices.

**Perfect for Your Eyes:**
- **Diopter Adjustment Range:** Get the perfect fit with our adjustable diopter range from 0.00D to -6.00D, ensuring comfortable viewing for all.

**Stay Connected:**
- **Cloud Gaming:** Enjoy the power of cloud gaming, allowing you to play demanding games without the need for powerful hardware.

Whether you're watching your favorite show, playing the latest games, or simply enjoying some downtime, the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses are your gateway to an extraordinary viewing experience. Step into the future with Rokid AR Joy Pack today!

[Shop Now](#) | [Learn More](#)
